title: Slow download speed when downloading LoL
body:
I bought new PC and tried to download lol my internet speed is great,and download speed is 7.30Mbps but when i download league it is only 190Kbps. Im downloading on new client and im really confused... any help?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I had the same problem so i did this:
1. Go to your firewall
2. Allow an app or feature through Windows Firewall
3. Press change settings
4. Find lol on the least and check both squares (If you don`t have it on the list just ad it on the botton "Allow another app" than go to "browse" find folder "Riot" in local disk C: or wherevever you installed lol.
After taht just add "LeagueClient" and check both squares(Private and Public)

I hope it helps :D

Patching can vary depending on your network strength and stability, but also how fast your hard drive is able to write it all down.  Unless you are running into any errors, it's best to let the patcher keep doing it's thing.  Once finished, go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network for any future patching.  I hope that helps!

If anyone still can't get decent download speed with latest client, try this when downloading 
1. go to task manager 
2. search lol program that's using your internet conection 
3. right click go to file location 
4. close lol 
5. open as admin whatever lol program that using internet earlier. (mine : LeagueClient.exe)

(this *.exe is in deeper folder than just " _C:\Riot Games\League of Legends_ " folder. It should be like this "_C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.120\deploy_")

It work for me for fresh install btw
